game.name: Ultimate Ski Jumping 2020
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Shared/Split Screen PvP, Shared/Split Screen, Steam Achievements, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Remote Play Together, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Winter competitions, summer competitions and even jumping on the Moon! Trainings, qualification rounds and tournaments are all waiting for you! Play the way you like!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Winter competitions, summer competitions and even jumping on the Moon! Trainings, qualification rounds and tournaments are all waiting for you! Play the way you like!

reviewHighlights.text: This game looks good on screenshots, but after several minutes of playing you realize, that it feels like a flash based browser game. It's created in...
Reminded me of old ski jumping game from when i was a kid [spoiler]Ski Jump International[/spoiler] , but ultimately to my dissapointment this one is...
